presentation1.title: Your trusted partner!
presentation1.p1: By choosing to include Mobiliis in your travel project, you benefit from expert step-by-step support. Our tailored services are adjusted to your profile and your goals.
presentation1.p2BeforeBold: Discover in more detail our distinctive approach and our vision for preparing your journey
presentation1.p2Bold: to France, Belgium, and Canada, followed by your integration.

langue.title: Our Language Courses
langue.description: Discover courses tailored to your needs: whether you're a beginner or advanced, learn with native experts. Study at your own pace with flexible training available online or on-site. Prepare for certifications with personalized and career-oriented support.

cards.title: General & Professional English - TOEFL and IELTS Preparation
cards.desc: Private online lessons with native teachers

cards.title: Professional French - TCF, TEF Canada Preparation
cards.desc: Starting from 10 hours of online training

cards.title: General German - DSH and TestDaF Preparation

brochure.title: Download our documentation
brochure.rgpd: The information collected is subject to computer processing for the purpose of sending the requested information and documentation. The recipients of the data are the communication and recruitment teams and the sales department. Your data is stored under conditions ensuring its security and confidentiality for three years from its collection or from your last contact with us.

servicesSection.title: Our Services
servicesSection.subtitle: We offer complete or specific services for your travel process to the destinations and countries of your choice, depending on your needs.

items.title: Student pre-financing
items.description: Your short stay in the Schengen area can last up to 90 days. Mobiliis makes the process easier with three key steps: assessment, visa support, and document preparation.

items.title: Find your housing
items.description: Mobiliis helps international students access top schools. We guide you from A to Z with a unique experience that can change your life.

items.title: AVI + Travel Insurance
items.description: We help you secure your journey with the right guidance and coverage tailored to your profile, so you can travel with peace of mind.

items.title: School guidance + Admission
items.description: We help you build your study plan: program selection, application file, coaching, and follow-up until admission.

items.title: Language test preparation
items.description: Get ready for your exams (IELTS, TOEFL, TCF, TEF…) with tailored coaching and resources adapted to your level.

items.title: Extra service
items.description: An additional service depending on your needs: advice, paperwork, follow-up and personalized assistance.

students.message: The program at ESCG Paris proved to be relevant, as I completed my final year in a work-study program and wrote a professional thesis on a real issue related to my host company.
Thanks to ESCG Paris, I was able to complete my apprenticeship within my company. The program matches the challenges I face daily and the teachers are excellent listeners.

I signed my permanent contract a few months before the end of my professional training program, with an executive status. None of this would have been possible without my mentor and the teaching staff at ESCG Paris.
In my opinion, ESCG Paris is a school that knows how to support students in their journey and help them move forward. It gave me the tools I needed to succeed — with effort and motivation, I made it.

others.message: Mobiliis supported me throughout my travel process with clear advice and a well-prepared file. I was guided from start to finish.
A responsive team, serious follow-up and real help with documents. I saved time and avoided many mistakes.
I recommend Mobiliis for their support and responsiveness. The file was complete and clearly explained.

presentation.anecdoteText: Abused by ill-intentioned people during my travel procedures.
presentation.desireText: Make the travel process easier for anyone who wants to travel.
presentation.storyP1: But the journey was long throughout my entire procedure. I had to overcome administrative obstacles, block funds requested by the consulate, find an invitation from a relative living in France, and secure housing proof. These steps were stressful before leaving Yaoundé and upon arriving in France.
presentation.storyP2: However, this experience made me realize that many people who wish to travel face the same difficulties.
presentation.renewText: Created in 2022, Mobiliis is a firm specialized in strategic guidance for training and orientation for your study and immigration projects in France, Canada, and Belgium. Placing your ambitions at the heart of its mission, our firm has been committed from the beginning to addressing concerns and boosting careers with an international dimension. That is why we have built strong partnerships with the most prestigious universities and schools worldwide to ensure a safe future and real chances of success for our students.
presentation.cultureText: Mobiliis’ organizational culture is a set of criteria that defines how we operate, our identity, our work mindset, and what sets us apart from competitors. It is based on shared values and orientations across our team: a strong sense of professionalism, daily rituals, methods of work, and a results-driven culture that supports sustainable growth.

cards.engagementP1: Because your future deserves a clear and reliable path, we commit to providing high-quality services that perfectly match your needs, expectations, and aspirations.
cards.engagementP2: We adapt to the evolution of our field by innovating through practices aligned with university requirements.
cards.engagementP3: Placing our clients at the heart of our concerns strengthens our commitment… for shared happiness and multiple experiences.
cards.missionP1: As a reference in academic and professional orientation, Mobiliis’ mission is to provide effective and tailored solutions to help everyone achieve their dream.
cards.missionP2: Our key role is to understand current challenges in the world of opportunities and help each person express their full potential.
cards.visionP1: Our vision is to become a strategic partner for students in their study projects by providing high value-added services and solutions that combine innovation and efficiency.
cards.visionP2: In short: to contribute effectively to the training and success of students.
